title: Bloomberg Markets: Health Bill Would Leave 22 Million Uninsured
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Health Bill Would Leave 22 Million Uninsured
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Anna Edney Health Care Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing the Obamacare replacement plan put forward by Senate Republicans would increase the number of uninsured Americans by 22 million while slashing funding for Medicaid, according to an estimate by the Congressional Budget Office.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
